title: Mini-Ep 38: Quitting Coffee and Hair Loss

description:
This week Kate and Doree get some sex tips from a listener and recommendations for more everyday must-have products. Then they hear from a listener struggling with keeping commitments due to social anxiety, discuss cutting caffeine out of their lives, and answer a question about postpartum hair loss.

To leave a voicemail for a future episode, call 781-591-0390 or email us at forever35podcast@gmail.com. Visit forever35podcast.com for a complete list of products mentioned on this episode.
